name: shiori-request-helper
description: Ukagaka SHIORI request() handler wrapper and utilities

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.docdist: cd doc && git clean -fd && git rm -rf * && cd .. && npm run doc && cd doc && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m doc && git push
scripts.doc: typedoc --mode file --out doc --readme Readme.md --disableOutputCheck --excludeNotExported lib && cd doc && git status && cd ..

author: Narazaka
